item.title: Basic concepts
item.description: Basic concepts Kubewebhooks embreces simplicity that’s why there are very few components that are required, a webhook server is made up of a server and one or more webhooks. Webhooks There are two types of webhooks, Validating and Mutating, they are valid Webhook interface implementation. Validating webhooks These webhooks only validate the received object, a Validating webhook is made up of a Validator interface, this interface only validates an metav1.
